solution.text:
Discount percentage = 25%
Final price = original price - (discount percent x original price/100)
Therefore, Final bill amount = _{{2*j*(100+k)}}_ - (25 x _{{2*j*(100+k)}}_/100) = Rs. _{{(150)*Decimal(j)*(100+k)/100}}_

content.text: If the man had a discount of 25% on the entire bill, How much did he pay finally for his meal ?
